original_text: It is he who will build the temple of the Lord, and he will be clothed with majesty and will sit and rule on his throne. And he will be a priest on his throne. And there will be harmony between the two.’
korean_text: 그가 여호와의 전을 건축하고 영광도 얻고 그 자리에 앉아서 다스릴 것이요 또 제사장이 자기 자리에 있으리니 이 둘 사이에 평화의 의논이 있으리라 하셨다 하고

sentences.original_text: It is he who will build the temple of the Lord
and he will be clothed with majesty
and will sit and rule on his throne
And he will be a priest on his throne
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그의 보좌에서 제사장이 될 것이며

sentences.original_text: And there will be harmony between the two
